Get the Time Series Information

Source: R/util_functions.R
ts_info.Rd

Returning the time series object main characteristics

ts_info(ts.obj)

Arguments

ts.obj

A time series object of a class "ts", "mts", "xts", or "zoo"

Value

Text

Examples


# ts object
data("USgas")
ts_info(USgas)
#>  The USgas series is a ts object with 1 variable and 238 observations
#>  Frequency: 12 
#>  Start time: 2000 1 
#>  End time: 2019 10 

# mts object
data("Coffee_Prices")
ts_info(Coffee_Prices)
#>  The Coffee_Prices series is a mts object with 2 variables and 701 observations
#>  Frequency: 12 
#>  Start time: 1960 1 
#>  End time: 2018 5 

# xts object
data("Michigan_CS")
ts_info(Michigan_CS)
#>  The Michigan_CS series is a xts object with 1 variable and 480 observations
#>  Frequency: monthly 
#>  Start time: Jan 1980 
#>  End time: Dec 2019
